DOC.detailed_description: The primary study endpoint objective response rate . The study design follow Simon 's test , p1-p0=0.15 . p1 optimum level activity experimental treatment ( exemestane ) , p0 minimum expect activity . In study , p1 25 % ( 25 % RR ) p0 10 % ( 10 % RR ) . With alpha error 0.05 beta error 0.1 , Simon test establishes first step 21 patient per treatment arm . If least 2 objective response observe exemestane arm , recruitment continue 100 patient recruit . After second recruitment phase , least 7 objective response must observe confirm expect exemestane level activity .
